pt: {sc}disgrace{/sc} {sc}dishonor{/sc} {sc}disrepute{/sc} {sc}infamy{/sc} {sc}ignominy{/sc} mean the state or condition of suffering loss of esteem and of enduring reproach. {sc}disgrace{/sc} often implies humiliation and sometimes ostracism.
{sc}dishonor{/sc} emphasizes the loss of honor that one has enjoyed or the loss of self-esteem.
{sc}disrepute{/sc} stresses loss of one's good name or the acquiring of a bad reputation.

pt.t: a once proud name fallen into {it}disrepute{/it}

pt: {sc}infamy{/sc} usually implies notoriety as well as exceeding shame.
